entry.title: codingdisciple.com
entry.summary:

Content includes but not limited to:

  • A 6-part series on the basics of statistics and hypothesis testing in Python.
  • Business oriented data analysis â€¦
entry.content:
An educational website designed to provide resources on data science. This website was built with an emphasis on coding in python using real world datasets and examples.

Content includes but not limited to:

  • A 6-part series on the basics of statistics and hypothesis testing in Python.
  • Business oriented data analysis/visualization with SQL and Python.
  • Predicting Titanic Survivors using machine learning with emphasis on data exploration.
  • Working with Spark SQL and Spark Dataframes in Python.
